txt.en: Bring the Haradrim sashes to Thurindol
Thurindol can be found in the keep at Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should show Thurindol the sashes you have collected from the Haradrim.

'What's this? Haradrim sashes? Well done! I may be able to make use of these sashes. Perhaps we can use them to confuse the enemy. We'll tie them to arrows shot from a different direction than our encroaching ambush. This could work quite well indeed.'
Harlanc is located south of Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should collect sashes off the Haradrim you defeat in Harlanc.
Collect sashes from Haradrim at Harlanc ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Haradrim sashes should be collected and brought to Thurindol as proof that you have completed your mission to disrupt the enemy gathered at Harlanc.

You need some way to show the Rangers that you've completed your mission to disrupt the Haradrim at Harlanc. You've noticed that Haradrim always wear brightly coloured sashes. Perhaps returning to Thurindol with these sashes will convince him of your heroics.
Take sashes from defeated Haradrim at Harlanc
Harlanc is located south of Bâr Húrin.\n\nYou should collect sashes off the Haradrim you defeat in Harlanc.
